subSections.title: Etymology
subSections.text: Compare {{cog|tbq-pro|*b/m-laŋ||penis, male, husband}} with animal *'''s-''' or *'''k-''' prefix ({{zh-ref| Schuessler, 2007}}). Cognate with {{cog|mro|klaŋ}}, {{cog|lus|tlaŋ||male}}, {{cog|mjw|chè lóŋ||buffalo}}, {{cog|bo|གླང||ox}}; additionally Schuessler rejected the Tibetan item's cognacy with Old Chinese {{och-l|象}}  "elephant".
